EmailTemplate.name: New Case Escalation
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.RecordType} Case Escalation Alert
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A {!Case.RecordType} case # {!Case.CaseNumber} created on {!Case.CreatedDate} has not been worked within the escalation time frame.
This is the 1st escalation notification. The next escalation will result in a case reassignment. Please navigate to the case record linked below and review the details for this case.
Case Record Link: {!Case.Link}
Thank You Case Escalations Team
